cards.title: Research best platforms for hosting Recalibration Assessment
cards.description: Find 3-5 options for hosting the Recalibration Assessment. Consider free/low-cost tools that allow custom scoring and email capture.

cards.title: Draft email reactivation sequence (3 emails)
cards.description: Create a 3-email sequence to re-engage the dormant email list. Tone: warm, honest about the gap, excited about what's coming.

cards.title: Compile list of 20 YouTube video title ideas for first 8 weeks
cards.description: Generate 20 compelling video title options across the 7 content angles for the first 8 weeks of Sprint 1.

cards.title: Research competitor channels/communities in the 40-60 identity/transition space
cards.description: Identify 10-15 creators, communities, and channels serving men aged 40-60 going through identity/career transitions.

cards.title: Set up YouTube channel keywords and optimize descriptions
cards.description: Research best keywords for the channel niche. Update channel description, about section, and default video descriptions.

cards.title: Design Recalibration Assessment question framework
cards.description: Create the question structure, scoring logic, and result categories for the Recalibration Assessment.
